contents:
npm i echarts
spago install halogen-echarts-simple

type SimpleExampleEvent =
  ( name :: String
  , seriesIndex :: Int
  , dataIndex :: Int
  )

data DemoAction
  = SetChart2Offset String
  | Chart3Event (Record SimpleExampleEvent)
